member.name: M:Roots.Web.Controllers.EventController.Get(Roots.Web.Queries.EventQuery)
member.summary: Get a list of events with event type and place. Filter on date and event type, and paging with page number and limit.

member.name: M:Roots.Web.Controllers.EventController.Get(System.Int32)
member.summary: Get a specific event with event type and place.

member.name: M:Roots.Web.Controllers.PersonController.Get(Roots.Web.Queries.PersonQuery)
member.summary: Gets a list of all persons. Filter on name, gender and living status, and paging with page number and limit.
member.returns: A list of Person models with events

member.name: M:Roots.Web.Controllers.PlaceController.Get(Roots.Web.Queries.PlaceQuery)
member.summary: Gets a list of all places. Filter on name, and paging with page number and limit.
